exact_source: On 28 August 2023, QMines entered into a binding terms sheet with Mackerel Copper Pty Ltd (Mackerel), a wholly owned subsidiary of Zenith Minerals Ltd (Zenith), to acquire a 100% interest in the Develin Creek project... the acquisition of the remaining 49% interest in the project (Additional Interest) was to occur on 5 September 2024... The consideration payable for the Additional Interest was $975,000 (plus GST) in cash and $687,500 in QMines shares. (Original earn-in exploration terms not provided in this completion announcement).
